# stringValue

**Instance Property**

The number object’s value expressed as a human-readable string.

## Declaration

```swift
var stringValue: String { get }
```

## Discussion

The string is created by invoking [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSNumber/description(withLocale:)] where locale is `nil`.

## Retrieving String Representations

- **description(withLocale:)**: Returns a string that represents the contents of the number object for a given locale.
